item.title: Http Status Code Overview
item.author: Author
item.description: Reference: https://www.restapitutorial.com/httpstatuscodes.html ⭐︎ -> “Top 10” HTTP Status Code. More REST service-specific information is contained in the entry. 1XX Information 100 continue – Client should continue 101 switching protocols 102 processing (webDAV) 2XX Success ⭐︎200 OK – The request has succeeded. General status code. Most common code used to indicate success. ⭐︎201 Created – A new resource has been created and should return a URI. Successful creation occurred (via either POST or PUT).
